content.question: The graph shows the velocities of two carts as functions of time as the carts move toward each other, collide, and then move away from each other on a horizontal track. Which of the following correctly indicates whether the momentum and total kinetic energy of the two-cart system are the same before and after the collision?

choices.label: Both momentum and total kinetic energy are the same before and after the collision.
Only momentum is the same before and after the collision.
Only total kinetic energy is the same before and after the collision.
It canâ€™t be determined without knowing the relative masses of the carts.

content.answer: Both momentum and total kinetic energy are the same before and after the collision.
